C

calcHeight(ArrayList<String>) - Static method in class webscraperwikipedia.TreeImage
Calculates tree height by finding the line with the highest amount of tabs (\t), the number of max tabs will be the tree height
calcNodesTiles(ArrayList<String>) - Static method in class webscraperwikipedia.TreeImage
Creates a list with all the x and y tiles coordinate for each line in the corresponding index Example: Codfica: Vespasiano Tito Giulia Flavia Flavia Domiziano Result: [[1,1], [2,1], [3,1], [3,2], [2,2]]
calcWidthPerHeight(ArrayList<String>) - Static method in class webscraperwikipedia.TreeImage
Calculates the width (number of members) for each height level of the tree by calculating the number of tabs (/t) for each line and then adding 1 to the found height depth
closeDriver(WebDriver) - Method in class webscraperwikipedia.Person
Close the Web Driver
countMatches(String, String) - Static method in class webscraperwikipedia.StringProcessor
Counts how many times a substring appears in a string
createImage(int) - Static method in class webscraperwikipedia.TreeImage
Calculates all the attribute values and then it creates and saves the image in a folder called "History"
createNodes(ArrayList<String>) - Static method in class webscraperwikipedia.TreeImage
Creates the list of nodes to draw using the attributes calculated before, each iteration creates a new Node object
